EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar (1323967138.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar (1323967138.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultant Services Email 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Sharan,
Thanks for the reply; and I’m sure we will be here when the project is right for MBO.
We do have some Mobile needs. Can you please send me some examples of your work, perhaps a short paragraph about your capabilities so that I can send this to my CTO?
Thanks,
Steve
From: sharankumar sivakumar [mailto:sharan107@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 9:11 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sharankumar
Hi Steven, I remember that I had a conversation with you earlier. But it will take some more time for me to make use of MBO. But before that, I would like to say that I am a iPhone/iPad/mobile app developer. When I saw your website, I had in mind that your customers love to have your services on mobile. If you are interested in creating a mobile app for you company which offers the services in mobile/iphone/ipad, Please let me know. We can work it out.
Thanks, Sharan. Subject: MBO Partners / Sharankumar Date: Wed, 14 Dec 2011 20:06:12 -0600 CC: To: sharan107@hotmail.com From: sarhancet@mbopartners.com Dear Sharankumar, I noticed that you recently visited our website! We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC. Regards, Steven ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
